title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 507.2 - Legal base
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 507.2 - Legal base

State Regulations
(a) Section
7.09
of the

Mental Hygiene Law grants the Commissioner of Mental Health the power and
responsibility to adopt regulations that are necessary and proper to implement
matters under his/her jurisdiction. (b) Section
41.49
of
the Mental Hygiene Law authorizes the Commissioner of Mental Health to
promulgate rules and regulations for the operation and funding of programs that
expand the existing community based system of mental health services or create
new services for children with serious emotional disturbance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
507.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
